00016 double puWeights_class::GetWeight(int nPU, int runNumber){
00017   if(PUweights_itr->first != runNumber){ 
00018     PUweights_itr = PUWeightsRunDepMap.find(runNumber);
00019     if(PUweights_itr==PUWeightsRunDepMap.end() || PUweights_itr->second.empty()){
00020       warningCounter++;
00021       if(warningCounter<=1){
00022         std::cerr << "[WARNING] runNumber " << runNumber << " not found in PUWeightsRunDepMap" << std::endl;
00023       }
00024       return 1;
00025     }
00026   }
00027 
00028   PUweights_t::const_iterator weight_itr = PUweights_itr->second.find(nPU);
00029   if(weight_itr== PUweights_itr->second.end()){
00030     warningCounter++;
00031     if(warningCounter==1){
00032     std::cerr << "[WARNING] in-time nPU " << nPU << " not found in weight files" << std::endl;
00033     std::cerr << "          Events dropped with applying weight=0" << std::endl;
00034     std::cerr << (PUweights_itr->second.begin()->first) << std::endl;
00035     }
00036     return 0;
00037   }
00038   
00039   
00040   return weight_itr->second;
00041 }

00044 void puWeights_class::ReadFromFile(std::string filename){
00045   std::cout << "PU REWEIGHTING:: Using file " << filename << std::endl;  
00046 
00047   PUWeightsRunDepMap_t::iterator weights_itr = PUWeightsRunDepMap.begin();
00048   if(weights_itr==PUWeightsRunDepMap.end()){
00049     PUweights_t PUWeights;
00050     weights_itr = (PUWeightsRunDepMap.insert(std::pair<int,PUweights_t>(1,PUWeights))).first;
00051   } else {
00052     weights_itr->second.clear();
00053   }
00054 
00055   f_pu  = new TFile(filename.c_str(),"READ");
00056 
00057   f_pu->cd();
00058     
00059   TH1D *puweights = 0;
00060   TH1D *gen_pu = 0;
00061 
00062   gen_pu= (TH1D*) f_pu->Get("generated_pu");
00063   puweights= (TH1D*) f_pu->Get("weights");
00064   
00065   
00066   if (!puweights || !gen_pu)
00067     {
00068       std::cout << "weights histograms  not found in file " << filename << std::endl;
00069       return;
00070     }
00071   
00072   
00073   TH1D* weightedPU= (TH1D*)gen_pu->Clone("weightedPU");
00074   weightedPU->Multiply(puweights);
00075   //Rescaling weights in order to preserve same integral of events
00076   TH1D* weights= (TH1D*)puweights->Clone("rescaledWeights");
00077   weights->Scale( gen_pu->Integral(1,MAX_PU_REWEIGHT) / weightedPU->Integral(1,MAX_PU_REWEIGHT) );
00078   
00079   float sumPuWeights=0.;
00080   
00081   for (int i = 0; i<MAX_PU_REWEIGHT; i++) {
00082       float weight=1.;
00083       weight=weights->GetBinContent(i+1);
00084       sumPuWeights+=weight;
00085       //      PUweights[i]=weight;
00086       PUWeightsRunDepMap.begin()->second.insert(std::pair<int,double>(i,weight));
00087   }
00088   
00089   //     TFile PUfile(json_filename,"read");
00090   //     TH1F *PUhist = (TH1F *) PUfile.Get("weight");
00091   //     if(PUhist==NULL){
00092   //       std::cerr << "ERROR: pileup weights histogram not found in " << json_filename << std::endl;
00093   //       return; // mettere un exit
00094   //     }
00095   //     PUweights = generate_flat10_weights(PUhist);
00096   //     PUfile.Close();
00097   
00098   f_pu->Close();
00099   
00100   return;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void puWeights_class::ReadFromFiles(std::string mcPUFile, std::string dataPUFile, int runMin){
00104   PUWeightsRunDepMap_t::iterator weights_itr = PUWeightsRunDepMap.find(runMin);
00105   if(weights_itr==PUWeightsRunDepMap.end()){
00106     PUweights_t PUWeights;
00107     weights_itr = (PUWeightsRunDepMap.insert(std::pair<int,PUweights_t>(runMin,PUWeights))).first;
00108   } else {
00109     weights_itr->second.clear();
00110   }
00111 
00112   std::cout << "[STATUS] Reading PU histograms from files: " << mcPUFile << "\t" << dataPUFile << std::endl;  
00113   TFile data(dataPUFile.c_str());
00114   TFile mc(mcPUFile.c_str());
00115   
00116   if(!data.IsOpen() || !mc.IsOpen()){
00117     std::cerr << "[ERROR] data or mc PU file not opened" << std::endl;
00118     exit(1);
00119     return;
00120   }
00121 
00122   TH1D* puMC_hist = (TH1D*) mc.Get("pileup");
00123   if(puMC_hist==NULL){
00124     TTree *puMC_tree = (TTree*) mc.Get("PUDumper/pileup");
00125     if(puMC_tree==NULL){
00126       std::cerr << "[ERROR] mc pileup histogram is NULL" << std::endl;
00127       exit(1);
00128       return;
00129     }
00130     puMC_tree->Draw("nPUtrue>>pileupHist_mc(60,0,60)","BX==0");
00131     puMC_hist = (TH1D *) gROOT->FindObject("pileupHist_mc");
00132     puMC_hist->SaveAs("tmp/puMC_hist.root");
00133   }
00134   
00135   TH1D *puData_hist = (TH1D *) data.Get("pileup");
00136   //  puData_hist->GetBinWidth(3);
00137   if(puData_hist==NULL){
00138     puData_hist = (TH1D *) data.Get("PUDumper/pileup");
00139     if(puData_hist==NULL){
00140       std::cerr << "[ERROR] data pileup histogram is NULL" << std::endl;
00141       exit(1);
00142       return;
00143     }
00144   }
00145 
00146   // they should have bin width = 1
00147   if(puMC_hist->GetBinWidth(2) != 1){
00148     std::cerr << "[ERROR] Bin width for mc pileup distribution different from 1" << std::endl;
00149     exit(1);
00150     return;
00151   }
00152 
00153   if(puData_hist->GetBinWidth(2) != 1){
00154     std::cerr << "[ERROR] Bin width for data pileup distribution different from 1" << std::endl;
00155     exit(1);
00156     return;
00157   }
00158 
00159   // they should have the same binning otherwise PU weights until the max between them
00160   int nBins = MAX_PU_REWEIGHT;
00161   if(puData_hist->GetNbinsX() != puMC_hist->GetNbinsX()){
00162     std::cerr << "[WARNING] Different binning between data and mc pileup distributions:" << puData_hist->GetNbinsX() << "\t" << puMC_hist->GetNbinsX() << std::endl;
00163     nBins=std::min(puData_hist->GetNbinsX(),puMC_hist->GetNbinsX());
00164     //std::cerr << "Pileup reweighted until nPU max = " << nBins;
00165   } 
00166 
00167   nBins=std::min(MAX_PU_REWEIGHT,nBins);
00168 
00169   float puMC_int = puMC_hist->Integral(0,nBins);
00170   float puData_int = puData_hist->Integral(0,nBins);
00171   puMC_hist->Scale(1./puMC_int);
00172   puData_hist->Scale(1./puData_int);
00173 
00174   double puMCweight_int=0;
00175   for (int i = 0; i<nBins; i++) {
00176     double binContent=puMC_hist->GetBinContent(i+1);
00177     if(binContent==0 && puData_hist->GetBinContent(i+1)!=0){
00178       if(puData_hist->GetBinContent(i+1) < 1e-4){
00179         std::cerr << "[WARNING] mc bin empty while data not: iBin = " << i+1 << std::endl;
00180         std::cerr << "          data bin = " << puData_hist->GetBinContent(i+1) << std::endl;
00181       } else {
00182         std::cerr << "[ERROR] mc bin empty while data not: iBin = " << i+1 << std::endl;
00183         std::cerr << "        data bin = " << puData_hist->GetBinContent(i+1) << std::endl;
00184         exit(1);
00185       }
00186     }
00187     double weight = binContent>0 ? puData_hist->GetBinContent(i+1)/binContent : 0;
00188     // the MC normalization should not change, so calculate the
00189     // integral of the MC and rescale the weights by that 
00190     puMCweight_int+=weight * binContent; 
00191     weights_itr->second.insert(std::pair<int,double>(i,weight));
00192 #ifdef DEBUG
00193     std::cout << "[DEBUG] " << weights_itr->first << "\t" << weights_itr->second[i] << "\t" << weights_itr->second.size() << std::endl;
00194 #endif
00195   }
00196  
00197   for (int i = 0; i<nBins; i++) {
00198     weights_itr->second[i]/=puMCweight_int;
00199   }
00200   PUweights_itr=PUWeightsRunDepMap.begin();
00201   if(TString(puMC_hist->GetName()).Contains("Hist")) delete puMC_hist;
00202   return;
00203 }

00205 // tree is the input MC tree
00206 // fastLoop = false if for any reason you don't want to change the branch status of the MC tree
00207 TTree *puWeights_class::GetTreeWeight(TChain *tree,  bool fastLoop, TString nPUbranchName){
00208   TString runNumberBranchName="runNumber";
00209 
00210   Float_t weight=0;
00211   TTree *newTree = new TTree("pileup","");
00212   newTree->Branch("puWeight", &weight, "puWeight/F");
00213 
00214   if(fastLoop){
00215     tree->SetBranchStatus("*",0);
00216     tree->SetBranchStatus(nPUbranchName,1);
00217     tree->SetBranchStatus(runNumberBranchName,1);
00218   }
00219 
00220   Int_t nPU[200];
00221   Int_t runNumber;
00222   tree->SetBranchAddress(nPUbranchName, nPU);
00223   tree->SetBranchAddress(runNumberBranchName, &runNumber);
00224   // loop over tree 
00225   for(Long64_t ientry = 0; ientry<tree->GetEntriesFast(); ientry++){
00226     tree->GetEntry(ientry);
00227     weight = GetWeight((int)nPU[0], runNumber); //only intime pu
00228     newTree->Fill();
00229   }
00230 
00231   
00232   if(fastLoop) tree->SetBranchStatus("*",1);
00233   tree->ResetBranchAddresses();
00234   std::cout << "[WARNING] nPU > nPU max for " << warningCounter << " times" << std::endl;
00235   return newTree;
00236 }
